title: [1.14.4-1.13.2][Exp ore——经验矿石]从现在起，不缺经验
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2173204318 于 2019-8-14 17:53 编辑 


Exp ore
经验矿石


Hello!Today I would like to present you some simple, basic mod, made specially for minecraft 1.13.2 - Experience Ore Block Mod.Mod adds simple one block which after breaking gives you a lot of experience (between 500 and 1500 to be precise).You can find it in every biome below Y=80.Also you can craft it with standard minecraft resources.Crafting recipe:Spoiler (click to hide) This mod is fully configurable (from 1.1 version), you can change:-minimum and maximum exp that can drop from the ore-minimum and maximum vein size-if the ore should generate-maximum height that the ore can generate at-how many times the vein should generate per chunkPlease have in mind that forge didn't implement gui config support yet, so the config is only text file at the moment.Recipe is located in mod data folder, so you can also change it :)Note that this mod is made for minecraft 1.13.2 and requires minecraft forge (mod was made with forge 0.48 for 1.13.2).Note: I saw similiar mods but I noticed that they have not been updated for a long time, so if I violate any copyrights, please feel free to PM me to delete the mod, or just delete the mod (if you are an admin :p)
-可完全配置[1.1版本以上]从矿石中掉落的最小和最大经验最小和最大矿脉大小矿石是否产生矿石可产生的最大高度-可合成




DOWNLOAD[无汉化][推荐原贴下载]
汉化及备份版本下载https://share.weiyun.com/5reXafj1.14使用1.13汉化即可

关于授权
已通过作者申请
